posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
KidMiracleman wrote:
I was thinking something like Ranger Bard AA
With the favored human class being ranger, you really have no other choice for an AA.

In most environments, I feel Rogue AA's are the most powerful (outside of divine ones, that is) but the XP penalty is there in this case.  The only downside of ranger is that the WIS 14 needed for spellcasting will drain away some potential DEX AB which can be a boon for stealthy AAs.  But at least the divine casting can be successful wearing armor so leaving the Bard as a singer only, you need not compound the problem further by boosting CHA for arcane casting and trying to fit Still Spell into a feat-starved design.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
From the description, it looks like Lupinal is a subrace of Humans, not a subclass. Even though Ranger is not required, the free Bane of Enemies would not be useful without favored enemies from Ranger (or maybe Harper Scout).

Perhaps your Ranger 26 / Fighter 4 / CoT 10 idea would be pretty good after all. You might be better off making that a melee build, and for an archer, use Elf or a subrace of Elf with AA. There is nothing in the Ranger class that makes it a better at archery than melee. Archery without AA is generally weaker than melee, which is probably why AA was added in the first expansion pack (SoU).

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
KidMiracleman wrote:
Would using an elf race defeat the purpose of wanting to use the subrace Lupinal?
According to what you posted, it must be human to get Lupinal.   

Empyre suggested you build a straight elven AA to compare how much benefit Lupinal actually lends to an archer build.  The AA will undoubtedly have much higher AB and damage but the free feats may open up other advantages.  The mage tertiary qualifier will cost -4AC unless you include some tumble class.  The minor consequence is that AA levels will be postponed later in pre-epic because of AA's BAB prereq (+6).  Fighter-types can reach that in 6 levels, tumble classes need 8.
